member.name: M:Octave.NET.OctaveContext.Execute(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute command and return raw response.

member.name: M:Octave.NET.OctaveDoubleExtensions.ToOctave(System.Double[])
member.summary: Convert array of doubles to octave input (vector).

member.name: M:Octave.NET.OctaveDoubleExtensions.ToOctave(System.Double[][])
member.summary: Convert two-dimensional array of doubles to octave input (matrix).

member.name: P:Octave.NET.OctaveSettings.MaximumConcurrency
member.summary: Maximum number of octave processes which can be simultaneously spawned. Defaults to the number of processors.

member.name: P:Octave.NET.OctaveSettings.OctaveCliPath
member.summary: Path to the octave-cli.exe binary. Can be automatically detected if added to PATH variable.

member.name: P:Octave.NET.OctaveSettings.PreventColdStarts
member.summary: When set to true, octave processes will never be killed even if they are idle for very long time. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Octave.NET.OctaveSettings.RemoveIdleWorkersTimePeriodMs
member.summary: How often should it check for idle workers and dispose them. Defaults to 10000.
